name: Impact Imminent
description:
"Where am I? It's so cold. My clothes are getting wet? is it raining?" William thought to himself as he opened the Emergency hatch

Impact Imminent is a Sci-fi exploration game where the main character William crashes into a planet. He needs to escape before IT catches him. Collect all 5 Jammer pieces to Jam the Stasis Turret signal to leave the planet.
